plan.name: read-order-destination-info
plan.description:
Retrieves the order's destinationinfo, which contains links to:
* A selector for choosing the order's shipping address: [Select Shipping Address](#shipmentdetails_select-shipping-address) * The shipping address currently selected for the order: [Read Order Shipping Address](#shipmentdetails_select_read-order-shipping-address) * The delivery the destinationinfo belongs to: [Read Order Delivery](#orders_read-order-delivery)

step.description: Read the destinationinfo for the order.

plan.name: read-order-shipping-option-info
plan.description:
Retrieves the order's shippingoptioninfo, which contains links to:
* A selector for choosing the order's shipping option: [Select Shipping Choice](#shipmentdetails_select-shipping-choice) * The shipping option selected for the order: [Read Order Shipping Option](#shipmentdetails_read-order-shipping-option) * The delivery the shipping option belongs to: [Read Order Delivery](#orders_read-order-delivery)

step.description: Read the shippingoptioninfo for the order.

plan.name: read-order-shipping-option
plan.description: Retrieves the shipping option that is currently selected for the order. The shipping option is how the order will be shipped, i.e. (FedEx, Canada Post, etc). If a shipping option has not been selected for the order, the shipping option link will not appear on the shippingoptioninfo. For information on how to select the shippingoption, see [Select Shipping Choice](#shipmentdetails_select-shipping-choice)

step.description: Read the shipping option that is currently selected for the order.

plan.name: select-shipping-option
plan.description: Uses a Selector to choose the shipping option for the order. The shipping option is how the order will be shipped, i.e. (FedEx, Canada Post, etc). The shipping options available for your shipment depend on which shipping regions and shipping options are configured for your store. Check with your store's administrator for more information on these options.

step.description: Retrieve the selector.
Retrieve a choice.
Retrieve a selected choice, if any.
Retrieve a choice's description.
Select a choice.
